name: getteam
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nhl_stats_and_live_data.
Tool description: Get live data and stats about any NHL game, teams, players, drafts and many more.

API description: Fetches the details of an NHL team based on the provided team ID, with optional query parameters to expand the response and specify the season.

expand.description: Additional data to expand in the response. Defaults to 'team.roster'.

season.description: The specific season for which to return team data. Defaults to 20172018.
